document_api_meta.title: Get Product
document_api_meta.env_desc: Retrieve all properties of a product, except those in the `FREEZE` or `DELETED` status.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: return_under_review_version
request_query_param.desc:
A flag to indicate what product information to retrieve if a live product (`ACTIVATE` status) is edited and resent for TikTok Shop review.
- True: Retrieves the latest version of the product information that is currently under review.
- False: Retrieves a snapshot of the product information that is live and online (before the edit).
Default: False

request_query_param.name: return_draft_version
request_query_param.desc:
A flag to indicate what product information to retrieve if a product has a draft in TikTok Shop.
- True: Retrieves the draft version of the product information.
- False: Retrieves the latest product information.
Default: False

**Note**: 
- Applicable only if the product is in the `DRAFT`, `ACTIVATE`, `SELLER_DEACTIVATED`, or `PLATFORM_DEACTIVATED` status.
- This field and `return_under_review_version` are mutually exclusive. Specify only one to receive results.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^id
response_param.desc: The product ID generated by TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^status
response_param.desc:
The product status in TikTok Shop. This status incorporates both the product status and the audit status.
Possible values: 
- DRAFT
- PENDING
- FAILED
- ACTIVATE
- SELLER_DEACTIVATED
- PLATFORM_DEACTIVATED
- FREEZE
- DELETED

**Note**: For Indonesia sellers, if you did not set the listing platform as `TIKTOK_SHOP` when creating or editing a product, this will be omitted.

response_param.name: ^title
response_param.desc: The product title.

response_param.name: ^category_chains
response_param.desc: Product category tree information.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The ID of the category of this product.

response_param.name: ^^parent_id
response_param.desc:
The parent category ID. 
For the root category, the parent ID is `0`.

response_param.name: ^^local_name
response_param.desc: The name of the category in the country where the shop operates.

response_param.name: ^^is_leaf
response_param.desc:
A flag to indicate if the category is a leaf category. 

**Note**: You can only create or edit products that belong to a leaf category.

response_param.name: ^brand
response_param.desc: Product brand information.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The ID of the brand of this product.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: The brand name of this product.

response_param.name: ^main_images
response_param.desc: A list of images to display in the product image gallery.

response_param.name: ^^height
response_param.desc:
The image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^width
response_param.desc:
The image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^uri
response_param.desc: The URI of the image.

response_param.name: ^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^video
response_param.desc: Product video information.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The video ID.

response_param.name: ^^cover_url
response_param.desc: The URL to view the video cover image.

response_param.name: ^^format
response_param.desc: The video format.

response_param.name: ^^url
response_param.desc: The URL to view the video.

response_param.name: ^^width
response_param.desc:
The video width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^height
response_param.desc:
The video height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^size
response_param.desc:
The video's original file size.
Unit: MB

response_param.name: ^description
response_param.example:
Please compare above detailed size with your measurement before purchase.

  • M-Size
  • XL-Size
response_param.desc: The product description in HTML format.

response_param.name: ^package_dimensions
response_param.desc: The dimensions of the product package

response_param.name: ^^length
response_param.desc: The package length.

response_param.name: ^^width
response_param.desc: The package width.

response_param.name: ^^height
response_param.desc: The package height.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc: The unit for the package dimensions.

response_param.name: ^package_weight
response_param.desc: The weight of the product package.

response_param.name: ^^value
response_param.desc: The package weight.

response_param.name: ^^unit
response_param.desc:
The unit for the package weight.
Possible values:
- `KILOGRAM`
- `POUND`

response_param.name: ^skus
response_param.desc: A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^seller_sku
response_param.desc: An internal code/name for managing SKUs, not visible to buyers.

response_param.name: ^^price
response_param.desc: SKU pricing information.

response_param.name: ^^^tax_exclusive_price
response_param.desc:
**Global sellers**
The SKU's **local pre-tax price**. This excludes any applicable charges such as cross-border shipping costs, taxes, and other fees, and therefore does not appear on the product page.

**Note**: Tax-exclusive pricing does not apply to JP and US shops using China warehouses, therefore this value is the same as `sale_price`.

response_param.name: ^^^sale_price
response_param.desc:
**All sellers**
The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values based on the region:
- BRL:  Brazil
- EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain
- GBP: United Kingdom
- IDR: Indonesia
- JPY: Japan
- MXN: Mexico
- MYR: Malaysia
- PHP: Philippines
- SGD: Singapore
- THB: Thailand
- USD: United States
- VND: Vietnam

response_param.name: ^^^unit_price
response_param.desc:
The unit price of the SKU. 
You can display the unit price to facilitate easier price comparisons across different products and packaging sizes.
Applicable only for the EU market.

**Note**: 
- This value is available only if you have defined the elements used to calculate this price when creating the product.
- Unit price = Selling price/(SKU unit count/base unit count)

response_param.name: ^^inventory
response_param.desc:
SKU inventory details.
**Note**: This field is not supported in post-live drafts. Therefore, the values here will always reflect those in the base version, even if you set `return_draft_version=true`.

response_param.name: ^^^warehouse_id
response_param.desc:
The ID of the warehouse where the SKU is stored. 
Retrieve details of the warehouse from the [Get Warehouse List API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa418defece02be6e66b6).

response_param.name: ^^^quantity
response_param.desc:
The total SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
Valid range: [1, 99,999]

Note: This quantity specifically refers to the in-stock inventory that can be shipped immediately.

response_param.name: ^^^backorder_quantity
response_param.desc:
The `backorder_quantity` will automatically be converted to `quantity` once in-stock inventory is sold out. The fulfillment of this inventory follows the `handling_time` specified below.
Note: Made-to-order (MTO), pre-order, and custom products cannot be backordered, and thus are incompatible with backorder_quantity.

response_param.name: ^^^handling_time
response_param.desc: The estimated number of working days needed for a backorder to be shipped. Currently, different warehouses for the same SKU are not allowed to have different `handling_time`

response_param.name: ^^identifier_code
response_param.desc: A regulated identifier code assigned to a product based on international standardized regulations (e.g. GTIN) to ensure the product is universally identifiable across various platforms and systems.

response_param.name: ^^^code
response_param.desc: The identifier code.

response_param.name: ^^^type
response_param.desc:
The type of identifier code.
Possible values:
- GTIN
- EAN
- UPC
- ISBN
- JAN

response_param.name: ^^sales_attributes
response_param.desc: A list of attributes  (e.g. size, color, length) that define each variant of a product.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The sales attribute ID.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The sales attribute name.

response_param.name: ^^^value_id
response_param.desc: The sales attribute value ID.

response_param.name: ^^^value_name
response_param.desc: The sales attribute value name.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_img
response_param.desc: The default/main image for each value (e.g. red) of the primary sales attribute (e.g. color). This appears in the product options gallery on TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^^height
response_param.desc:
The image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^width
response_param.desc:
The image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^^^uri
response_param.desc: The URI of the image.

response_param.name: ^^^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^^^supplementary_sku_images
response_param.desc:
A list of supplementary images for each value (e.g. red) of the primary sales attribute (e.g. color) to provide multiple views or details of the product for that attribute value. These appear in the product options gallery on TikTok Shop.

Applicable only for the US market.

response_param.name: ^^^^uri
response_param.desc: The URI of the image.

response_param.name: ^^^^height
response_param.desc:
The image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^width
response_param.desc:
The image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^^external_sku_id
response_param.desc: An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the SKU between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform.

response_param.name: ^^combined_skus
response_param.desc: If this SKU belongs to a virtual bundle, this object contains the list of individual SKUs that form the bundle (e.g. gift basket, starter pack).

response_param.name: ^^^product_id
response_param.desc: The ID of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_count
response_param.desc: The quantity of the source SKU included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_sku
response_param.desc: An internal code/name for managing the source SKU, not visible to buyers.

response_param.name: ^^^title
response_param.desc: The title of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^sales_attributes
response_param.desc: A list of attributes  (e.g. size, color, length) that define the source SKU.

response_param.name: ^^^^id
response_param.desc: The sales attribute ID.

response_param.name: ^^^^name
response_param.desc: The sales attribute name.

response_param.name: ^^^^value_id
response_param.desc: The sales attribute value ID.

response_param.name: ^^^^value_name
response_param.desc: The sales attribute value name.

response_param.name: ^^^^sku_img
response_param.desc: The default/main image for each value (e.g. red) of the primary sales attribute (e.g. color) of the source product. This appears in the product options gallery on TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^^^height
response_param.desc:
The image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^^width

The image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^^^^uri
response_param.desc: The URI of the image.

response_param.name: ^^^^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^^^^supplementary_sku_images
response_param.desc:
A list of supplementary images for each value (e.g. red) of the primary sales attribute (e.g. color) to provide multiple views or details of the source product for that attribute value. These appear in the product options gallery on TikTok Shop.

Applicable only for the US market.

response_param.name: ^^^^^uri
response_param.desc: The URI of the image.

response_param.name: ^^^^^height
response_param.desc:
The image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^^width
response_param.desc:
The image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^^^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^^^price
response_param.desc: Source SKU pricing information.

response_param.name: ^^^^tax_exclusive_price
response_param.desc:
Global sellers
The source SKU's local pre-tax price. This excludes any applicable charges such as cross-border shipping costs, taxes, and other fees, and therefore does not appear on the product page.

Note: Tax-exclusive pricing does not apply to JP and US shops using China warehouses, therefore this value is the same as sale_price.

response_param.name: ^^^^sale_price
response_param.desc:
All sellers
The source SKU's local display price shown on the product page before any discounts.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values based on the region:
- BRL:  Brazil
- EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain
- GBP: United Kingdom
- IDR: Indonesia
- JPY: Japan
- MXN: Mexico
- MYR: Malaysia
- PHP: Philippines
- SGD: Singapore
- THB: Thailand
- USD: United States
- VND: Vietnam

response_param.name: ^^^inventory
response_param.desc: Source SKU inventory details.

response_param.name: ^^^^warehouse_id
response_param.desc:
The ID of the warehouse where the source SKU is stored. 
Retrieve details of the warehouse from the [Get Warehouse List API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/get-warehouse-list-202309).

response_param.name: ^^^^quantity
response_param.desc: The total quantity available in the warehouse of the source SKU.

response_param.name: ^^^product_main_image
response_param.desc: The main image of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^^height
response_param.desc:
The image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^width
response_param.desc:
The image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^^^uri
response_param.desc: The URI of the image.

response_param.name: ^^^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^^^categories
response_param.desc: The category tree information of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^^id
response_param.desc: The ID of the category of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^^parent_id
response_param.desc: The parent category ID of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^^local_name
response_param.desc: The name of the category in the country where the shop operates.

response_param.name: ^^^^is_leaf
response_param.desc: A flag to indicate if the category is a leaf category.

response_param.name: ^^^brand
response_param.desc: Brand information of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^^id
response_param.desc: The ID of the brand of  the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^^name
response_param.desc: The brand name of the source product included in the virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^^^combined_listing_not_live_reasons
response_param.desc:
The reasons linked to the source product included in the virtual bundle that are keeping the virtual bundle status from being live.
Possible values:
- SUB_PRODUCT_DEACTIVATE: Indicate the source product has been deactivated.
- SUB_PRODUCT_DELETE: Indicate the source product has been deleted.
- SUB_PRODUCT_FROZEN: Indicate the source product has been frozen.
- SUB_SKU_DELETE: Indicate the source SKU has been deleted. 
- SUB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_FIRST_LEVEL_ERROR: Indicate the level one category of the virtual bundle does not match that of the source product. 
- SUB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_OVER_RESTRICTION:  Indicate the level one category of the source product is not in the set of restricted categories.

response_param.name: ^^global_listing_policy
response_param.desc:
Global Product Replicate (GPR) related information if the product is a target for synchronization.
Applicable only for the EU market.

response_param.name: ^^^price_sync
response_param.desc: A flag indicating whether the product price is synchronized.

response_param.name: ^^^inventory_type
response_param.desc:
The type of inventory to synchronize.
Possible values:
- SHARED: Inventory Area Sharing
- EXCLUSIVE: Inventory Exclusive

response_param.name: ^^^replicate_source
response_param.desc: The source global listing product to synchronize from.

response_param.name: ^^^^product_id
response_param.desc: The ID of the source product.

response_param.name: ^^^^shop_id
response_param.desc: The shop ID of the source product.

response_param.name: ^^^^sku_id
response_param.desc: The SKU ID of the source product.

response_param.name: ^^sku_unit_count
response_param.desc:
The total quantity/volume of the product represented by the SKU.
For example, if the SKU represents 500ml of water, this value would be 500 if the unit type is defined as ml.
Applicable only for the EU market.

**Note**: 
- This is mainly used to calculate the unit price of the SKU, and is required only if you wish to display the unit price to facilitate easier price comparisons across different products and packaging sizes.
- Unit price = Selling price/(SKU unit count/base unit count). Therefore if you want to obtain the unit price, you would also need to define the "base unit count" and the "unit type" product attributes. Retrieve the relevant information for these product attributes by using the [Get Attributes API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c5784a0bb702c0561cc8).

response_param.name: ^^external_urls
response_param.desc: A list of URLs for third-party product listing pages where consumers can place orders.

response_param.name: ^^extra_identifier_codes
response_param.desc:
A list of up to 10 additional identifier codes if the SKU belongs to a virtual bundle (containing multiple individual SKUs).

**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market.

response_param.name: ^^pre_sale
response_param.desc:
SKU presale information, used to tag a product as a presale product based on its presale type.

If this is not returned, it indicates that the product is a regular non-presale item.

response_param.name: ^^^type
response_param.desc:
The type of pre-sale.
Possible values based on the region:
**US**
- `PRE_ORDER`: The product is not yet available or released. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **release date**.
- `MADE_TO_ORDER`: The product is produced only after the order is received. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **duration**.
- `CUSTOM`: The product requires a fulfillment timeline that exceeds the standard due to other factors. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **duration**.

**UK, EU, SEA, JP, and LATAM**
- `PRE_ORDER`: The product is not yet available or released. Fulfillment can be extended by specifying a **duration**.

response_param.name: ^^^fulfillment_type
response_param.desc:
Information about the type of pre-sale order fulfillment and the corresponding timeframe.
- `handling_duration_days` is for fulfillment with an extended duration.
- `release_date` is for starting fulfillment on a fixed date.

response_param.name: ^^^^handling_duration_days
response_param.desc:
The desired duration for handling a pre-sale order and handing it over to a shipping carrier. 

Applicable only for the following regions and pre-sale type:
**US**
- `MADE_TO_ORDER`: Business days, from 3 to 14 days.
- `CUSTOM`: Business days, from 3 to 30 days.

**UK, EU, SEA, JP, and LATAM**
- `PRE_ORDER`: Calendar days, from 3 to 30 days.

response_param.name: ^^^^release_date
response_param.desc:
The date on which the product gets converted into a regular product and becomes available for general purchase. On this date, order handling will also start, changing the status of the order to [`AWAITING_SHIPMENT`](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650b1b4bbace3e02b76d1011).

Applicable only for `PRE_ORDER` in the US.
**Note**: This date is a unix timestamp (seconds) based on the seller-selected timezone in Seller Center.

response_param.name: ^^list_price
response_param.desc:
The SKU's list price information that has been verified to be legitimate by the audit team. This is equivalent to the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), or the recommended retail price (RRP).
Applicable only for the US market.

**Note**: 
- This field will be empty or display the last verified price if the submitted price fails verification.
- This value may appear as the strikethrough price on the product page. However, whether the strikethrough price is shown and the amount shown are subject to the audit team's review and decision based on various pricing information.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The price amount.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values: USD

response_param.name: ^^external_list_prices
response_param.desc:
The SKU list price (e.g. MSRP, RRP) or original price information on external ecommerce platforms.
Applicable only for selected sellers in the US market.

**Note**: This value may appear as the strikethrough price on the product page. However, whether the strikethrough price is shown and the amount shown are subject to the audit team's review and decision based on various pricing information.

response_param.name: ^^^source
response_param.desc:
The external ecommerce platform from which the price is sourced.
Possible values:
- SHOPIFY_COMPARE_AT_PRICE: The compare_at_price in Shopify.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The price amount.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc:
The currency.
Possible values: USD

response_param.name: ^^status_info
response_param.desc: Status information of the SKU.

response_param.name: ^^^status
response_param.desc:
The SKU status in TikTok Shop.
Possible values: 
- NORMAL
- DEACTIVATED

response_param.name: ^^^deactivation_source
response_param.desc:
The deactivation source of the SKU with `DEACTIVATED` status.
Possible values:
- SELLER: Indicates that the seller deactivated the SKU
- PLATFORM: Indicates that the platform de-activated the SKU due to violation reasons
- COMBO_RELATION: Indicates that the platform de-activated the bundle-SKU due to the deactivation of sub-SKU.

response_param.name: ^^fees
response_param.desc: The fees required for this product based on TikTok Shop policies. Fees are required only for certain product categories, retrieve the requirements from the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9).

response_param.name: ^^^type
response_param.desc:
The type of fee.
Possible values: PFAND

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc:
The fee amount.
Valid range:
- PFAND: [0.00 - 6300.00]

response_param.name: ^^^additional_attribute
response_param.desc:
Possible values for Pfand:
- SINGLE_USE
- REUSABLE
- NOT_APPLICABLE

response_param.name: ^^images
response_param.desc: A list of certification related images.

The image height.

The image width.

response_param.name: ^^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^^uri

response_param.name: ^^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^^expiration_date
response_param.desc: The expiration date of this certification expressed in unix timestamp (seconds) UTC+0.

response_param.name: ^size_chart
response_param.desc: The measurement details of the product to help buyers find the right size.

response_param.name: ^^image
response_param.desc: An image of the size chart.

response_param.name: ^^^height
response_param.desc:
The image height.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^width
response_param.desc:
The image width.
Unit: px

response_param.name: ^^^thumb_urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the image thumbnails.

response_param.name: ^^^uri
response_param.desc: The URI of the image.

response_param.name: ^^^urls
response_param.desc: The URLs to view the images.

response_param.name: ^^template
response_param.desc: A TikTok Shop size chart template generated by the size chart tool in Seller Center > Manage Products > Bulk action > Batch manage size charts.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The size chart template ID.

response_param.name: ^is_cod_allowed
response_param.desc:
A flag indicating whether to show the Cash On Delivery (COD) payment option during checkout.
Applicable only for the following markets:
- Global sellers: MY, PH, SA, TH, VN
- Local sellers: ID, MY, PH, SA, TH, VN

response_param.name: ^product_attributes
response_param.desc: A list of general attributes (e.g. manufacturer, country of origin, materials used) that describe the product as a whole, regardless of variant.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The ID of the product attribute.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: The product attribute name.

response_param.name: ^^values
response_param.desc: A list of selectable values for the product attribute.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The product attribute value ID.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The product attribute value name.

response_param.name: ^audit_failed_reasons
response_param.desc: TikTok Shop audit failure information.

response_param.name: ^^position
response_param.desc: The audit failure reason name.

response_param.name: ^^reasons
response_param.desc: A brief reason for failing TikTok Shop audit.

response_param.name: ^^suggestions
response_param.example: ["The product violates TikTok Shopping listing rules, please check and resubmit."]
response_param.desc: A detailed explanation of the reason for failure.

response_param.name: ^^listing_platform
response_param.desc:
The platform for listing the product.
Possible values:
- TIKTOK_SHOP
- TOKOPEDIA

response_param.name: ^update_time
response_param.desc:
The time when the product is last updated.
Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^create_time
response_param.desc:
The time when the product is created.
Unix timestamp.

response_param.name: ^delivery_options
response_param.desc:
The custom delivery options applied to this product, overriding the default warehouse delivery option.  
**Note**: This field is not supported in post-live drafts, therefore the values here will always reflect those in the base version, even if you set `return_draft_version=true`.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The delivery option ID.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: The delivery option name.

response_param.name: ^^is_available
response_param.desc: A flag indicating whether the delivery option is available for this product.

response_param.name: ^external_product_id
response_param.desc: An external identifier used in an external ecommerce platform. This is used to associate the product between TikTok Shop and the external ecommerce platform.

response_param.name: ^product_types
response_param.desc:
The product type.
Possible values:
- COMBINED_PRODUCT: Indicates this is a virtual bundle product.
- IN_COMBINED_PRODUCT: Indicates this product is part of a virtual bundle.
- GPR_TARGET_PRODUCT: Indicates this product is synchronized to global listings. Applicable only for the EU market.

response_param.name: ^is_not_for_sale
response_param.desc:
A flag indicating whether the product is not for sale and only available through Gift with Purchase (GWP) promotions. Such products won't appear in searches or recommendations
True: Not for sale
False: For sale

response_param.name: ^recommended_categories
response_param.desc: Recommended categories for the product based on the product title, description, and images.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The ID of the recommended category.

response_param.name: ^^local_name
response_param.desc: The name of the category in the country where the shop operates.

response_param.name: ^manufacturer_ids
response_param.desc:
The list of manufacturer IDs. 
Pass this value to the `manufacturer_id` field in the [Search Manufacturers API](67066a580dcee902fa03ccf9) to obtain more information about a manufacturer.

**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories

response_param.name: ^responsible_person_ids
response_param.desc:
The list of responsible person IDs. 
Pass this value to the `responsible_person_id` field in the [Search Responsible Persons API](67066a55f17b7d02f95d2fb1) to obtain more information about a responsible person.

**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories

response_param.name: ^listing_quality_tier
response_param.desc:
The current quality tier of this product listing. The quality tier of a product listing depends on the quality of the content in its product fields such as the title, image, attributes etc.

Possible values:
- POOR
- FAIR
- GOOD

**Note**: Available only for the US market.

response_param.name: ^integrated_platform_statuses
response_param.desc:
The current status of the product on platforms that are natively integrated with TikTok Shop (e.g. TOKOPEDIA).

**Note**: For Indonesia sellers, if you did not set the listing platform as `TOKOPEDIA` when creating or editing a product, this will be omitted.

response_param.name: ^^platform
response_param.desc:
The integrated platform name.
Possible values:
- TOKOPEDIA

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The product status in the integrated platform.
Possible values:
- DRAFT
- PENDING
- FAILED
- ACTIVATE
- SELLER_DEACTIVATED
- PLATFORM_DEACTIVATED
- FREEZE
- DELETED

response_param.name: ^shipping_insurance_requirement
response_param.desc:
The shipping insurance purchase requirement imposed on buyers for the product.

Possible values:
- REQUIRED: Shipping insurance is mandatory and buyers can't opt out.
- OPTIONAL: Buyers can choose to purchase shipping insurance through the platform.
- NOT_SUPPORTED: Shipping insurance is not supported for the product.
Default: OPTIONAL

Applicable only if the listing platforms include TOKOPEDIA.

response_param.name: ^minimum_order_quantity
response_param.desc:
The minimum order quantity for the product.
Valid range: [1, 20]

Applicable only for the Indonesia market and selected sellers in other SEA markets. Contact your account manager for more information about gaining access to this field.

response_param.name: ^is_pre_owned
response_param.desc:
A flag to indicate if the product is pre-owned.
Applicable only if TOKOPEDIA is the sole listing platform.

**Note**: Pre-owned products on the TikTok Shop platform are identified by the `category_id`, which must belong to one of the designated pre-owned product categories (e.g. pre-owned luxury bags, luggage, and accessories).

response_param.name: ^audit
response_param.desc:
Product audit information.
**Note**: Applicable only to products listed on TikTok Shop. Not applicable for products listed only on Tokopedia.

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The product audit status.
Possible values: 
- NONE: The product is not applicable for audit because it has not been submitted for listing on this platform, or it is in a draft, frozen, or deactivated state.
- AUDITING: The product is currently being audited.
- FAILED: The product failed the audit, or the audit was cancelled.
- PRE_APPROVED: The product has passed the audit but is not yet listed due to pending prerequisites. Refer to `pre_approved_reasons` for the prerequisites.
- APPROVED: The product passed the audit and has been listed on the platform.

response_param.name: ^^pre_approved_reasons
response_param.desc:
The reason why the product is pre-approved. 
Applicable only if `audit.status=PRE_APPROVED`, otherwise returns an empty array.

Possible values:
- KYC_PENDING: The seller's onboarding (KYC - Know Your Customer information) is incomplete or awaiting processing.
- RESTRICTED_CATEGORY_PENDING: The product is in a restricted category, and category approval is still pending. To request access, submit an application through the Qualification Center on TikTok Shop Seller Center. Applicable only for the US market.

response_param.name: ^global_product_association
response_param.desc:
The global product association established through global product publishing or manual binding.

**Note**: 
- Applicable for global sellers and intra-EU sellers.
- Not applicable for EU sellers who synchronized products from other markets using the Global Product Replicate (GPR) tool. Refer to `global_listing_policy` instead to find the associated source products.

response_param.name: ^^global_product_id
response_param.desc: The global product ID in TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^sku_mappings
response_param.desc: The list of sku mappings between the global and local products.

response_param.name: ^^^global_sku_id
response_param.desc: The global SKU ID in TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^local_sku_id
response_param.desc: The local SKU ID in TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^sales_attribute_mappings
response_param.desc: The list of sales attribute mappings between the global and local SKUs.

response_param.name: ^^^^local_attribute_id
response_param.desc: The local sales attribute ID.

response_param.name: ^^^^global_attribute_id
response_param.desc: The global sales attribute ID.

response_param.name: ^^^^local_value_id
response_param.desc: The local sales attribute value ID.

response_param.name: ^^^^global_value_id
response_param.desc: The global sales attribute value ID.

response_param.name: ^prescription_requirement
response_param.desc:
Prescription related information for the product.
**Note**: Applicable only for Tokopedia. This object is returned for all pharmacy products, and omitted for non-pharmacy products.

response_param.name: ^^needs_prescription
response_param.desc: A flag to indicate whether a prescription is required to purchase this pharmacy product.

response_param.name: ^product_families
response_param.desc:
The **live** product family that this product belongs to. A product family is a virtual group of products that share common characteristics (such as flavor, version, or size), allowing them to appear as selectable variations on the product page.
**Note**: 
- Applicable only for US local sellers.
- Omitted if this product does not belong to any product family.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The product family ID.

response_param.name: ^^products
response_param.desc: A list of products that belong to the family.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The product ID.

response_param.name: ^subscribe_info
response_param.desc: All the Save and Subscribe promotion info associated with the given product.

response_param.name: ^^support_subscribe
response_param.desc: A flag outlining whether the seller and given product support Subscribe and Save promotions.

response_param.name: ^^subscribe_status
response_param.desc:
An enum outlining whether the given product has an active Subscribe and Save promotion:
- ENABLED
- NOT_ENABLED

response_param.name: ^^subscribe_discount_details
response_param.desc: All of the Save and Subscribe discount details.

response_param.name: ^^^discount_level
response_param.desc:
An enum that communicated the type of discount:
- REGULAR
- FIRST_ORDER
- RETENTION

response_param.name: ^^^discount_value
response_param.desc: The value of the discount. A value of 10, would indicate a 10% discount.

response_param.name: ^^subscribe_promotion_config
response_param.desc: A subscription configuration specific to the seller. It outlines the different types of promotions and associated constraints that are available for use.

response_param.name: ^^^discount_level
response_param.desc:
An enum that communicated the type of discount:
- REGULAR
- FIRST_ORDER
- RETENTION

response_param.name: ^^^discount_options
response_param.desc: The discount options available to the seller for the given discount level.

response_param.name: ^^^max_discount
response_param.desc: The maximum discount a seller can set for the associated discount level.

response_param.name: ^^^min_discount
response_param.desc: The minimum discount a seller can set for the associated discount level.

response_param.name: ^has_draft
response_param.desc:
A flag to indicate if the product has a draft.
- true: It has a draft.
- false: It does not have a draft.

response_param.name: ^primary_combined_product_id
response_param.desc: If the product is a virtual bundle, this value is the ID of the primary product in the bundle. The value is omitted if the product is not a virtual bundle.

response_param.name: ^product_status
response_param.desc:
The product status in TikTok Shop unrelated to its audit status.
Possible values: 
- INITIAL
- DRAFT
- ACTIVATE
- SELLER_DEACTIVATED
- PLATFORM_DEACTIVATED
- FREEZE
- DELETED

**Note**: For Indonesia sellers, if you did not set the listing platform as `TIKTOK_SHOP` when creating or editing a product, this will be omitted.

response_param.name: ^is_replicated
response_param.desc: A flag to indicate if the product contains a replica (created through local replication) in other local markets.

response_param.name: ^shipping_template_id
response_param.desc: Identifier of the shipping template that was bound to the product

error_code_list.msg: The product ID does not exist.
You cannot edit the specified product(s) as it isn't listed in your account or shop.
The product ID does not exist
There is no version of this product that is under review. Please obtain the online version.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
The product in its current status is not available for this operation. Change the product status and try again.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.

request_path_param.name: product_id
request_path_param.desc: The product ID in TikTok Shop.
